import React,{useState} from 'react' import Navigation from '../Navigation/Navigation' import {apiUrl} from '../../config' import axios from 'axios' function CreateTeacher() { const initialValues = { email: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', gender: '', schoolName: "", category: '', state:'', city:'', experience: '', schoolType: '' } const[teacher, addTeacher] = useState(initialValues) const handleInputChange = e => { const {name,value} = e.target const fieldValues = {[name]:value} addTeacher({ ...teacher, ...fieldValues }) } let headerConfig = { headers: { 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' } }; const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const addUrl = apiUrl+"teachers/add" axios.post() } return ( <>
